Thanks for finding my video and pressing play!

This report wasn‚Äôt meant to come out today and I explain why in the video.

I have done quite a few Virgin Trains videos and won‚Äôt be making any for a while, so I can focus on more variety next year (if you want to know my plans, look at the Community tab in my channel, or your notifications, I posted a post about them yesterday!). 

Overall a fairly standard trip with Virgin West Coast. However, Virgin should be under no illusion that what they serve on board is NOT a dinner. The purpose of them serving hot meals on board is because their morning and evening trips cross breakfast time and dinner time. This gives busy people the opportunity to eat their meal on the train and not have to worry about getting up early for a breakfast, or make a dinner when they get home. There‚Äôs no way their tiny third of a fish with one potato and a few strips of root vegetables is a dinner! This was surprising because their breakfasts are quite sufficient. 

As this was a night trip there‚Äôs not much to see outside so apologies if you feel this report is a bit light on content. However, starting next Sunday, new look Trip reports are coming in 4K HD, so sit tight and I hope you‚Äôre looking forward to 2018 as much as I am!

Make sure you have your notifications set! üõé
